extension.summary: All the best from cCloud TV
extension.description: cCloud is an open source cloud based social IPTV service. It is built by the community for the community, where streaming is just a click away. Just click, play and stream yup it's that simple. Just go to http://ccloudtv.org and enjoy:) Please report any channels that are down here http://www.tiny.cc/reportchs

extension.summary: YouTube and more for Win/Mac/Linux PC
extension.description:
- This Kodi add-on can only be used on Windows, Macintosh, or Linux PC which must have Kodi Chrome Launcher and Google Chrome Browser installed.
[B]- Kodi add-on này chỉ dùng được trong máy Windows, Macintosh, hoặc Linux PC đã cài Kodi Chrome Launcher và Google Chrome Browser.[/B]

extension.description: A YouTube a világ egyik legnagyobb videómegosztó weboldala.
extension.summary: Plugin para YouTube
extension.description: YouTube es un uno de los mayores sitios web de intercambio de vídeos del mundo.

extension.description: Данное дополнение позволяет находить и смотреть видео на всеми любимом сайте.

extension.description: YouTube est l'un des plus grands sites de partage vidéos du monde.
